argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rhmmul.x | |- X = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rhmmul.m | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | rhmmul.n | |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_rhmmhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- X = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 3 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .X. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_mhmlin | |- ( ( F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( F ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) .X. ( F ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( F ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) .X. ( F ` B ) ) ) |
